means: 懒散地工作，漫无目的地走动( potter的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I was perfectly happy just pottering around doing up my flat.
sentence.Network_cn: 我特别愿意悠然自得地收拾公寓。

sentence.Network_en: I spent the day pottering around the house.
He used to be pottering about in a canoe on summer afternoons.
sentence.Network_cn: 他过去常常在夏日午后驾轻舟荡漾.

entry.def: A potter is someone who makes pottery.
